Translations.Text: upadesakkagi, navu kur‌anannu saralagolisiruvevu. Yaradaru iddareye, upadesa svikarisuvavaru
avaru helidaru; navenu, nam'molagina obba manavanannu himbalisabeke? Hage madidare navu darigettavaru hagu huccaragi biduvevu
nam'ma paiki avanige divya bodhaneyannu ilisikodalagideye? Avanantu sullugara hagu tannanne hogaluvavanagiddane
sullugara mattu tannanne hogaluvavanu yarembudu avarige nale tiliyalide
navu avara palige parikseyagi ondu hennonteyannu kalisuvevu (salihare,) nivu avarannu noduttaliri hagu sahanasilaragiri
Mattu nirannu avara naduve hancalagide. Pratiyobbaru niru kudiyuva tam'ma saradiya vele hajarirabeku endu avarige tilisiri (ennalayitu)
avaru (uravaru) tam'ma sangatiyannu karedaru. Avanu atikramakkilidanu hagu avanu (onteyannu) kadidu bittanu
konege, hegittu nanna sikse mattu nanna eccarike (embudannu nodiri)
navu avara mele onde ondu abbarada sidilannu eragisibittevu. Astakke avaru ona hullinantagi bittaru
navu upadesakkagi kur‌anannu saralagolisiruvevu. Upadesa svikarisuvavanu yaradaru iddaneye
navu avara mele kallugalannu surisuva birugaliyannu eragisidevu – lut‌ra maneyavara horatu. Avarannu navu munjavina samayadalle raksisidevu
adu nam'ma vatiyinda (nidalada) kodugeyagittu. Krtajnanadavanannu navu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru (lutaru) nam'ma sikseya kuritu avarannu (tam'ma janangadavarannu) eccarisiddaru. Adare avaru a eccarikeya kuritu jagalada todagidaru
mattu avaru, avara (lutara) atithigalannu avarinda kasidukolla bayasidaru. Aga navu avara kannugalannu alisibittevu – saviyiri nanna sikseyannu hagu eccarikeyannu
munjaneye avara mele sasvata sikseyondu eragibittitu
